title: Auto-banning new champs
body: Dear Riot, could you please just disable every new champ that comes out for at least a week in ranked so we dont have to waste a ban on it, even if the enemy team wastes a ban it feels kind of silly.

replies.body:
I agree wholeheartedly. Pick/banning phase is essentially strategy, and wheres the strategy In abandoning all strategy just to keep the game playable...

**How bans should be (and how RIOT pretends they are):**

_"They banned Caitlin, which means they will probably pick Vayne, So we will ban Vayne, and then we will pick Jinx."_

_"Ban Yasuo, so our mid can pick Aurelion Sol, and roam bot, to get Jinx fed."_

_"Ban Teemo, so that top can pick Nasus and farm up while the enemy's attention is on bot lane."_

**How bans _actually_ are:**

_"Ban Kled or dodge."_

_"Ban Hecarim, probably no one will play him, but 60% win rate isn't worth the risk."_

_"Ban Zed just becasue no one has fun playing against that cancer."_
Ban Vayne because no one has fun playing against that cancer.

Many people (me included) agree with this - here's a popular board that just came out and goes more in depth into it:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/wEZphQAp-can-we-ban-new-champions-from-being-played-in-ranked-untill-a-few-days-after-their-release
Not gonna happen, they're not going to perma ban every new champ on release for a week and stop people from being able to play them
